tokens.text: defines a block replacement rule with predicates

generated_doNotEdit.title: JigsawStructure Rule
generated_doNotEdit.description: A block rule that is evaluated on all blocks of a Structure Template. All predicates must evaluate to true in order for a block to be replaced by the output_state.

fields.title: input_predicate
fields.description: A predicate evaluated on the Structure Template block.

fields.title: block_entity_modifier
fields.description: A block state modifier for block entities when all predicate match.

fields.title: location_predicate
fields.description: A predicate evaluated on the world block.

fields.title: position_predicate
fields.description: A predicate evaluated on the distance between the structure's world origin and the world block.

fields.title: output_state
fields.description: Block to replace the world block with if all predicates evaluate to true.

subForm.title: Output State
subForm.description: Specifies a particular block. Can be a string block name or a JSON object
